title: Blended Learning Design for Practical Science Subjects: Utilizing VR and Real-Time Webinars

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific theories and experimental design, and basic operational skills with digital devices
context.additional_context: Practical science experiments and simulation learning using VR and real-time webinars in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Experimental procedures can be performed in a virtual science laboratory environment using smartphone-based VR tools
Collaborative problem-solving skills with peer learners and experts are enhanced through real-time online webinars
The scientific inquiry process using digital technology can be systematically organized as project deliverables

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
